column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. gharībat al-ḥusayn. qaṣīdah. rajaz

column3: yā turá fī qatlatī man ḥall lak
qult yā ṭayf al-khayāl man arsalak

column2: qāl khall al-‘ishq lā ta‘ba’ bih
column3: qult lawlā al-‘ishq mā dār al-falak
lays lī ḥukmun ‘alá man qad malak

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. ṣīkah. tawshīḥ mashṭūr al-raml lilṣṣafī al-ḥalī

column3: lays lī ḥukmun ‘alá man qad malak

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. ṣīkah. tawshīḥ muqtaḍab lilmu‘tamid bn ‘ubbād
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. gharībat al-ḥusayn. tawshīḥ muḍāri‘
al-ṣan‘ah. ṣīkah. qaṣīdah. basīṭ liqīs bn al-mulawwiḥ

column2: al-lah ya‘lam ann al-rūḥ qad faniyat
wanaẓratun fīk yā s’lī wayā amalī
ashhá ilay min al-dunyā wamā fīhā
